_thumbnail.label: Thumbnail
_thumbnail.sizeDescription: Max size is 10mb. Recommended dimensions: 760 x 505 or larger
_thumbnail.defaultThumbnailNotice: Upload your own thumbnail to replace the default.

location.label: Location
location.helperText: Show the geographic area where this project will take place (to appear on the project layout).

featuredContent.label: Featured content
featuredContent.helperText: Highlight specific documents, apps, and data related to your project. You can feature up to 4 items.

name.label: Project name
name.requiredError: Project name is a required field
name.maxLengthError: Project name must not exceed 250 characters

description.label: Description
description.helperText: Specify how your project will achieve its objectives. Consider including relevant background information and the changes expected as a result of the project.

summary.label: Purpose
summary.helperText: Briefly summarize the objectives of your project.

_thumbnail.helperText: Set a thumbnail to represent this project in ArcGIS Online as well as search and galleries.

featuredImage.label: Featured image
featuredImage.helperText: Select an image to represent your work on the project layout.
featuredImage.sizeDescription: Max file size is 10mb. Recommended dimensions: 718 x 478 or larger

altText.label: Alt text
altText.helperText: Provide a short description of your image for those using screen readers. Leave blank to indicate image is decorative.

tags.label: Tags
tags.helperText: Tags are used in search catalogs to help others find this project. Add text and select enter to create new tags.

categories.label: Categories
categories.helperText: Categories are used in search catalogs to help others find this project. They are set by your ArcGIS Online organization.

location.label: Location
location.helperText: Show the geographic area where this initiative will take place (to appear on the initiative layout).

featuredContent.label: Featured content
featuredContent.helperText: Highlight specific documents, apps, and data related to your project. You can feature up to 4 items.

name.label: Initiative name
name.requiredError: Initiative name is a required field
name.maxLengthError: Initiative name must not exceed 250 characters

summary.label: Purpose
summary.helperText: Briefly summarize the objectives of your initiative.

description.label: Description
description.helperText: Provide more context that might be helpful when searching for this initiative.

tags.label: Tags
tags.helperText: Tags are used in search catalogs to help others find this initiative. Add text and select enter to create new tags.

categories.label: Categories
categories.helperText: Categories are used in search catalogs to help others find this initiative. They are set by your ArcGIS Online organization.

_thumbnail.helperText: Set a thumbnail to represent this Initiative in ArcGIS Online as well as search and galleries.

prompt.label: Prompt
prompt.helperText: Briefly describe what you want participants to submit on this discussion board.

description.label: Description
description.helperText: Provide more context that might be helpful when searching for this board.

_thumbnail.helperText: Select an image to represent your discussion.

summary.label: Purpose
summary.helperText: Briefly describe the purpose of this Discussion Board which is helpful when sharing the link to others.

featuredImage.label: Featured image
featuredImage.sizeDescription: Max size is 10mb, JPEG, JPG, or PNG

altText.label: Alt text
altText.helperText: Provide a short description of your image for those using screen readers. Leave blank to indicate image is decorative.

enabled.label: Yes, discussion allowed
enabled.description: Participants can add posts, replies, and reactions to this discussion board.

disabled.label: No, discussion blocked
disabled.description: Removes the ability for new posts, replies, and reactions to be added. Does not delete previous participation.

location.label: Location
location.helperText: Show the geographic area to which this site pertains.

name.label: Site name
name.requiredError: Site name is a required field
name.maxLengthError: Site name must not exceed 250 characters

_thumbnail.helperText: Set a thumbnail to represent this Site in ArcGIS Online as well as search and galleries.

tags.label: Tags
tags.helperText: Tags are used in search catalogs to help others find this site. Add text and select enter to create new tags.

categories.label: Categories
categories.helperText: Categories are used in search catalogs to help others find this site. They are set by your ArcGIS Online organization.

discussable.label: Show discussions interface for signed-in users on live sites (on by default)

groupAccess.label: Set visibility
groupAccess.helperText: Control who can see follow buttons. This setting applies to both the flowing in-page action follow button and any follow button embedded directly on the layout.

private.label: Private
private.description: The site owner and groups with access can see the follow buttons

org.label: Organization
org.description: All members with an account to the site's org and groups with access can see the follow buttons

public.label: Public
public.description: Everyone can see the follow buttons

showFollowAction.label: Follow action
showFollowAction.helperText: Add a follow button to the in-page actions menu, which remains visible as users scroll through the layout.

discussable.label: Can this group participate in discussions?

enabled.label: Yes, discussion allowed
enabled.description: Group members can view and participate in discussion channels to which the group has access.

disabled.label: No, discussion blocked
disabled.description: Group members cannot view or participate in discussion channels to which the group has access.

location.label: Location
location.helperText: Show the geographic area to which this page pertains.

name.label: Page name
name.requiredError: Page name is a required field
name.maxLengthError: Page name must not exceed 250 characters

tags.label: Tags
tags.helperText: Tags are used in search catalogs to help others find this page. Add text and select enter to create new tags.

_thumbnail.helperText: Set a thumbnail to represent this Page in ArcGIS Online as well as search and galleries.

categories.label: Categories
categories.helperText: Categories are used in search catalogs to help others find this page. They are set by your ArcGIS Online organization.

title.label: Title
title.hint: Concise titles will increase discoverability across your content.

summary.label: Summary
summary.hint: Briefly summarize your content. TIP: Improve SEO by using keywords that differ from your "Title" or "Tags".

description.label: Description
description.hint: Add additional details explaining your content. Aim for a 7th-9th grade reading level to reach a broad audience. Use a free readability analysis tool to test your text.

tags.label: Tags
tags.hint: Tags are used in search catalogs to help others find this content. Add text and select enter to create new tags.

categories.label: Categories
categories.agolHint: Categories are used in search catalogs to help others find this content. They are set by your ArcGIS Online organization.
categories.enterpriseHint: Categories are used in search catalogs to help others find this content. They are set by your ArcGIS Enterprise organization.
categories.agolNoCategoryHint: Tip: Categories are only available if they are set by your organization in ArcGIS Online organization.
categories.enterpriseNoCategoryHint: Tip: Categories are only available if they are set by your organization in ArcGIS Enterprise organization.

_thumbnail.helperText: Set a thumbnail to represent this item in ArcGIS Online as well as search and galleries.

enabled.label: Yes, discussion allowed
enabled.description: Participants can add posts, replies, and reactions to this item.

disabled.label: No, discussion blocked
disabled.description: Removes the ability for new posts, replies, and reactions to be added. Does not delete previous participation.

serverExtractCapability.label: Extract Capability (export data)
serverExtractCapability.helperText: Enables the "extract" capability on this item's service. Extract supports additional formats.

hostedDownloads.label: (Beta) Hosted downloads
hostedDownloads.helperText: Create download files directly from a hosted service. This improves performance when downloading content such as Feature Layers and Tables. To enable hosted downloads, Extract Capabilities must be enabled.

basic.title: Basic Information
basic.message: This information is used to populate search results, gallery cards, and is displayed on the details view.

about.title: About Content
about.message: The first two lines of your description are what displays in search results, but the entire description will be shown on focused content views.

image.title: Featured Image
image.message:
Having a good featured image or thumbnail is important when you are showcasing your content in our galleries, or on views that highlight images such as initiatives, events, and surveys. 

Recommended size is 760x505. If your image displays blurry on live routes, please consider replacing the thumbnail with a larger image.

location.label: Location
location.helperText: Show the geographic area where this content will take place (to appear on the content layout).

downloads.label: Downloads
downloads.helperText: Configure download formats, cached file update schedule, and more. For more details see <calcite-link href="https://doc.arcgis.com/en/hub/content/data-download-settings.htm" target="_blank" icon-end="launch">download documentation.</calcite-link>

name.maxLengthError: Group name must not exceed 250 characters

membershipAccess.label: Who can be in this group?
membershipAccess.collab: Partnered collaboration and my organization's members only

discussable.label: Can this group participate in discussions?

enabled.description: Group members can view and participate in discussion channels to which the group has access.

disabled.label: No, discussion blocked
disabled.description: Group members cannot view or participate in discussion channels to which the group has access.

name.label: Name
name.requiredError: Initiative template name is a required field

previewUrl.label: Preview link
previewUrl.helperText: A preview link will be applied to the title and is helpful if you're planning to share the template publicly. Links should begin with "https://"

summary.label: Summary
summary.helperText: Write a short description of this template to appear in the template gallery (recommended to be 90 characters or less).

description.label: Description
description.helperText: Include information about how this template should be used. Consider including activation instructions for others.
